title: Game On: The Hottest Upcoming Gaming Token Airdrops
description: UPDATED: Crypto gamers can still get in on airdrops for Notcoin, BlockGames, Upland, Nyan Heroes, and more. Here's what you need to know.

title: Defi protocol Mozaic Finance suffers $2.4m heist
description: The breach, which caused a $2.4 million loss, targeted the Arbitrum chain on Mozaic, a layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum (ETH) designed to enhance scalability and efficiency.
